targets.query: SELECT "power_on_tag" FROM "fx5u_event"  Where "power_on_tag" = 1 ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT "power_on_tag" FROM "fx5u_event"  Where $timeFilter
SELECT "power_on_tag" FROM "fx5u_event"  Where "power_on_tag" = 0 ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT ( last("fx5u_utilization") / ( last(fx5u_power_on_time) + last(fx5u_power_off_time) ) ) * 100 FROM "work_time" WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY time(1d) tz('Asia/Taipei')
SELECT (last("fx5u_utilization") / (last(fx5u_power_on_time) + last(fx5u_power_off_time))) * 100 FROM "work_time" WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY time(1d) tz('Asia/Taipei')
SELECT (last("fx5u_utilization") / (last(fx5u_power_on_time) + last(fx5u_power_off_time))) * 100  FROM "work_time" WHERE $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(1d) tz('Asia/Taipei')
SELECT (fx5u_power_on_time + fx5u_power_off_time)  FROM "work_time" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT (last(fx5u_power_on_time) + last(fx5u_power_off_time))  FROM "work_time" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) tz('Asia/Taipei')
SELECT "fx5u_utilization"  FROM "work_time" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT last("fx5u_utilization") FROM "work_time" WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY time(1d) tz('Asia/Taipei')
SELECT last("count") FROM "work_time" WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY time(1d) tz('Asia/Taipei')
SELECT max("count") - min("count") FROM "work_time" WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY time(1h) tz('Asia/Taipei')
SELECT "count" FROM "work_time" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT last("count") FROM "work_time" WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY time(1d) tz('Asia/Taipei')
SELECT "coils_01" FROM "fx5u" WHERE $timeFilter AND coils_01 = 1
SELECT "Water_Pressure" FROM "fx5u" WHERE $timeFilter AND Water_Pressure = 1
SELECT "Water_Depth" FROM "fx5u" WHERE $timeFilter AND Water_Depth = 1

SELECT
    COUNT("coils_01")  as coils_01
FROM
    "fx5u"
WHERE
    $timeFilter AND
    coils_01 = 1
GROUP BY time(60m) tz('Asia/Taipei')

SELECT
    COUNT("Water_Pressure")  as Water_Pressure
FROM
    "fx5u"
WHERE
    $timeFilter AND
    Water_Pressure = 1
GROUP BY time(60m) tz('Asia/Taipei')

SELECT
    COUNT("Water_Depth")  as Water_Depth
FROM
    "fx5u"
WHERE
    $timeFilter AND
    Water_Depth = 1
GROUP BY time(60m) tz('Asia/Taipei')

SELECT
    COUNT("coils_01")  as coils_01
FROM
    "fx5u"
WHERE
    $timeFilter AND
    coils_01 = 1
GROUP BY time(8h) tz('Asia/Taipei')

SELECT
    COUNT("Water_Pressure")  as Water_Pressure
FROM
    "fx5u"
WHERE
    $timeFilter AND
    Water_Pressure = 1
GROUP BY time(8h) tz('Asia/Taipei')

SELECT
    COUNT("Water_Depth")  as Water_Depth
FROM
    "fx5u"
WHERE
    $timeFilter AND
    Water_Depth = 1
GROUP BY time(8h) tz('Asia/Taipei')
